mapper.select: SELECT memberCode,memberId,memberName,memberPhone,memberEmail,memberPostNum, memberAddress,memberDetailAddress from member where memberGrade = 'member' order by memberCode

SELECT memberCode,gradeName,memberName,memberPhone,memberEmail,memberPostNum, memberAddress,memberDetailAddress from member join manager join managerGrade on member.memberId=manager.memberId and manager.managerGradeCode=managerGrade.managerGradeCode where memberGrade = 'manager' order by manager.managerGradeCode
